What formula creates a centered variable? 
Answerlist
----------
* $X_{1}-M_{X_{1}}$
* $(X_{1}-M_{X_{1}})/SD_{X_{1}}$
* $X_{1}+M_{X_{1}}$
* $(X_{1}+M_{X_{1}})/SD_{X_{1}}$

Solution
========

* Correct

* Incorrect
